channel.title: Locations? PI
channel.description: where can i find like rules for player rights? i want my admin to be able to spawn items.. also where can i find the % for hits and the max hit?

item.title: Locations? PI
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

[quote=“escalation, post:4, topic:406590”]I think you have a public void that determines Moderator and Administrator commands.
If that command is under the Owner commands or a specific name, move it up to the Admin commands.[/quote]
can i just make that ==3 to ==3|| ==2
?

Read full topic

item.title: Locations? PI
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

I think you have a public void that determines Moderator and Administrator commands.
If that command is under the Owner commands or a specific name, move it up to the Admin commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Locations? PI
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))"); } } catch(Exception e) {

how do i change it to 2&&3?

Read full topic

item.title: Locations? PI
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Go to your commands

src>server>models>players>packets>commands

and change the right for the command pickup to a 2 instead of a 3.

IDK about max hits. not done too much with PI

Read full topic
